title: Update MicroFragments, Iterators, http-client-essentials, oauth2-essentials,…
message:
Update MicroFragments, Iterators, http-client-essentials, oauth2-essentials, smoothsync-api-client and support libraries
Also update Gradle
Fix a few minor issues

title: Change the provider meta field to be a URL instead of a plain provider ID to…
message: Change the provider meta field to be a URL instead of a plain provider ID to allow provisioning of other fields like the account id. Implements #2 (#3)

title: Micro fragments (#1)
message:
Micro fragments (#1)

* Switch to MicroFragments
* Add WebView to allow creating app-sepcific passwords without leaving the context of the setup.
* Fix issue of stalled loaders that were blocked by a thread waiting for a service connection by making sure that loaders are executed on a thread pool and service connections time out after 2 seconds.
* Pull in smoothsync-api-client from github
* Add Czech translation
* Fix Creator of ParcelableService not returning a Parcelable
* Don't filter domains by DNS A records, email domains must have an MX record, but not an A record.
